    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static QcdmCrc getInstance()

      • calculate

        public byte[] calculate(byte[] data)
        Description copied from interface: ChecksumCalc
        This method calculates the checksum for the given data and returns it a byte array. The bytes of this array should already be sorted with least-significant byte first.
        Specified by:
        calculate in interface ChecksumCalc
        Parameters:
        data - the data, to calculate the checksum on
        Returns:
        the checksum as byte array in LSB byte-order

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from interface: ChecksumCalc
        This method should return a name that identifies the checksum beneath different implementations.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface ChecksumCalc
        Returns:
        a name

      • calculateCrc

        public static int calculateCrc(byte[] data)
        This method calculates the CRC16-CCITT(really?) for the body of a Qualcomm DIAG message. This method was taken from C sources of the ModemManager project, out of the libqcdm subproject.
        Parameters:
        data - the data that should be digested for the CRC16 checksum
        Returns:
        the CRC16 checksum as an integer value
